divs: Sighting Detailsi see it every night, not sure what it is, i have many pics and videos of it and i'm hoping somebody can identify it as something whether it be a ufo or not, but its basically a random-flashing multicoloured star-like thing that just travels across the sky like the other stars but doesn't look anything like them. last night i was able to get better pics because it just seemed to be coming in extra bright. the colours i see flashing are red, yellow, green, blue and white, i am unsure if there is a pattern. i'm very excited to find out what this is and am gonna keep observing until i find out.
Summary: a pic and some videos of 'rainbow star' i been seeing
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Sarnia
There was one other sighting in Sarnia on or around April 2nd 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
